attributes.action: To Educate the author of the Mega Mosque petition and 13000+ people that have signed it, to the fact that it will NOT be funded from the public purse - Muslims will fund it!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country is becoming more and more intolerant of Muslims and anything to do with Islam.

There are many Muslims that do good in the country, living peaceful and productive lives.

Your administration, although (previously) supported by the vast majority of Muslims, has done more harm to that community than any other - with your weekly drip-feeding of soundbites that target the Muslims.

The mainstream media have helped whip up a storm with anything related to Islam - why do we not get to hear the non-extreme Muslim views; the views of those that are not waving their fists and shouting anti-everything slogans. They DO exist, but we only get to hear from the handful who are the root of controversy (and who are recycled again and again).

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
